Header.title: Welcome to Safe Haven!
Header.paragraph: Your dedicated sanctuary for mental well-being. Here, you'll find a supportive community, resources, and tools to navigate your mental health journey. We're here to listen, support, and empower you every step of the way. Take a deep breath, you're in a safe space now.

Services.name: Minute Meditation
Services.text: Quick, guided mindfulness sessions to promote relaxation and mental clarity.

Services.name: Loner Bots
Services.text: Virtual companions designed to provide support and companionship to users who feel lonely.

Services.name: Mindful Journaling
Services.text: Encourages users to reflect on their thoughts and emotions with a focus on present moment awareness and self-awareness.

Services.name: Mood Tracker
Services.text: Log and monitor your emotional well-being over time within Safe Haven.

Services.name: Therapy Sessions
Services.text: Accessible, confidential therapy sessions with licensed professionals tailored to your needs, right from the comfort of your Safe Haven app

Services.name: Exciting Levels
Services.text: Storylined and gamified levels to keep the users coming back to the application
